data.title: Core Operational Team
content: Mentored CS students to enhance their professional skills and technical knowledge, fostering a strong interest in technology through personalized guidance and support.
Conducted hands-on workshops covering essential tools like GitHub, Postman API, and Canva, promoting practical skill development and real-world application.
Organized and led beginner-friendly hackathons and workshops on blockchain fundamentals, encouraging collaboration, innovation, and problem-solving under time constraints.
